steps.text: Uther Pendragon, kind of Britain falls in love with Ygraine of Cornouailles.
But she's allready maried.
So Uther ask his good friend Merlin to help him. Merlin accept, but only if the child is given to him.
Uther, changed into Ygraine's husband, spend the night with her...
Nine months later, Merlin receives the child.
When Uther dies, there is no heir to succeede him. To prevent conflic between Britain's lords, Merlin comes with an idea.
He planted a sword in a big rock, and let everyone knows that the one who will take it out would be the legit king.
All the people of Britain run to take their chance, but none of them succeed.
Arthur, along with Merlin, try his luck. Without no one foreseeing it, he took it out at his first try and became king of Britain.
The new king is a peaceful and unifying.
To help him in his task, the lady of the lac offers him a migical sword, Excalibur !
Arthur put together the most brave and valorous knights of the kingdom around a big round table and tell them to travel through the contry and bring justice and civilisation.
Guenievre, a lovely lady steal Arthur's heart, and they get married.
One day, Perceval, a clumsy knight, comes around and tell Arthur about the Graal, a magical and sacred cup.
For now on, they all look for it passionately.
Sadly, Lancelot, one of the knights, and Gunievre got close when Arthur was searching for the Graal.
Mordred, one of the unworthy sons of Arthur, take advantage of this situation create a conflict between the knights.
A civil war take place, and the knights faithful to the kind are tracked down and killed.
Mordred and Arthur fight for hours...
And Arthur finaly kill him.
But deadly wonded, Arthur is taken to Avalon by his sister, the druid's sacred island.
